short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve HKU Moodle navigation & Include extra features for better UX

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In v1.1, Moodle Cleaner provides sorting, filtering, adding course-specific notes and custom links embedding.

v1.1.2 update: fix bugs on course ID detection & longer popup opening time for loading links.

To know more about Moodle Cleaner, visit here:
https://github.com/LeeHengYu/moodle-cleaner?tab=readme-ov-file#features
